mapper.select: select NEWS_ID newsId,TITLE title,CONTENTS contents,AUTHOR author,NEWS_TYPE newsType,CREATE_DATE createDate,UPDATE_DATE updateDate,DEL_FLG delFlg from BRN_NEWS where NEWS_ID = #{newsId}
mapper.update: update BRN_NEWS set TITLE = #{title} ,CONTENTS = #{contents} ,AUTHOR = #{author} ,NEWS_TYPE = #{newsType} ,UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where NEWS_ID = #{newsId} and UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}
update BRN_NEWS set UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,DEL_FLG = 1 where UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} and DEL_FLG = 0
